ygData.subject: Re: Dark Elf SK
ygData.msgSnippet: You are talking about the Journeyman Boots, right? If so, they have unlimited charges. You can keep using it over and over and the charges will never not run
ygData.messageBody:
You are talking about the Journeyman Boots, right? If so, they have unlimited charges. You can keep using it over and over and the charges will never not run out. I have never owned a mug; therefore, I cannot help you with that one.


-----Original Message-----
From: Remlin <remlin@...>
To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 9:59 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Dark Elf SK


The EQliser page says they have 1 charge?
What about the mugs you get off the Guards in Oggok.. They are +10 char, mugs... They say 1 charge too... Does that mean unlimited?? If not how u recharge them?
